title: new discord server, the great depth of zaun
body:
HELLo amigos, my story before is http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/EjAVAfJL-my-new-discord-server-the-great-depth-of-zaun so TLDR: this server is created so that all the players in the community can find some friends, unlike them selfs in the school cafeteria.
